meta.name: langsmith-fetch
meta.title: LangSmith Fetch - Agent Debugging Skill
meta.description: Debug LangChain and LangGraph agents by fetching execution traces from LangSmith Studio. Use when debugging agent behavior, investigating errors, analyzing tool calls, checking memory operations, or examining agent performance

original_definition.skill_description: Debug LangChain and LangGraph agents by fetching execution traces from LangSmith Studio. Use when debugging agent behavior, investigating errors, analyzing tool calls, checking memory operations, or examining agent performance. Automatically fetches recent traces and analyzes execution patterns. Requires langsmith-fetch CLI installed.

actions.name: Fetch Recent Traces
actions.description: Retrieve traces from LangSmith for specified time period

actions.name: Fetch Specific Trace
actions.description: Deep dive into a specific trace by ID

actions.name: Analyze Execution Flow
actions.description: Analyze trace data to identify agent goals, tool calls, and results

actions.name: Detect Errors
actions.description: Search traces for errors, failures, and exceptions

actions.name: Generate Debug Report
actions.description: Create comprehensive report with root cause analysis and suggested fixes

actions.name: Export Debug Session
actions.description: Save traces and analysis to timestamped folder

rules.name: Check Traces Found
rules.condition_expression: Traces exist in specified time range
branching_targets: expand time range or check tracing enabled

directives.name: Quick Debug Complete
directives.description: Recent activity analyzed with summary report

directives.name: Deep Dive Complete
directives.description: Specific trace fully analyzed with root cause

directives.name: Format Selection Knowledge
directives.description: pretty format for humans, json for detailed analysis, raw for piping

directives.name: Trigger Keyword Detection
directives.description: Activate on: debug my agent, show traces, check for errors, analyze memory operations, review performance

execution_paths.condition: User asks to debug recent agent activity
execution_paths.expected_outcome: Summary report of recent traces with issues identified
Deep analysis of specific trace with root cause
Error detection report with frequencies and patterns
Debug session saved to timestamped folder
